resources.string: Enter your registered email address ,We will send you an email to reset your password

is mobile application offered by PRASAD MEDICAL AND GENERAL STORES,Pratapnagar, Nagpur which takes cares of all your daily drug stores need, which making people’s life’s easier with convenient online order placing by instantly upload your prescription and leave the rest to our pharmacist – they will reach out to you promptly.

We offer complete range of prescription and non-prescription items which includes Allopathic, Ayurvedic medicines, Surgical items, cosmetic, OTC’s, Supplements, Instruments, Body care and Baby care products.

PRASAD MEDICAL AND GENERAL STORES established in Pratapnagar, Nagpur in year 1989 by Mr.Chandrakant Anirudh Phasate as consecutive branch of PHASATE MEDICALS, MAHAL, NAGPUR founded by Mr. Anirudh S. Phasate. Legacy of family business maintained and followed by third generation by Mr. Prasad C.
Phasate Awards and Recognition- PRASAD MEDICAL AND GENERAL STORES is awarded as BEST CHEMIST AND DRUGIST SHOP OF NAGPUR DISTRIC and 4time awarded as BEST CHEMIST AND DRUGIST SHOP OF AREA ‘M’ NAGPUR.
1. Valid prescription from a Doctor is mandatory for all medicine orders.
2. Kindly display the original prescription at the time of picking up medicines.
3. We will not be able to process the orders without a valid prescription.
4. Please show prescription at the time of delivery.
5. HOME DELIVERYS NOT AVAILABLE FOR SCHADULED DRUGS.
6. Delivery charges depend on mode of transit and will be communicated before dispatch.
7. Delivery charges within Nagpur city is Rs.6 per kilometer.
1. You are required to send a scan copy or photo of valid prescription from an authorized Doctor which is mandatory
2. No medicine will be delivered if the order amount is below Rs.1000 and avail free home delivery
3. Payment method only COD (Cash on Delivery) or card payment on doorstep is available
4. For all in stock items the delivery time will be confirmed by telephonic communication or notification through app or by SMS subject to availability.
Allowed file types: doc, docx, jpeg & pdf. Mandatory contents required in prescription
- Prescription Date (According to Prescription and doses)
Please enter the list of drugs to avoid misreading, However it is not mandatory.

Once the order is placed by either method, Prasad medical & general stores shall examine the authenticity of the order in terms of Products ordered & will deliver the order after complying with the requirements of Drugs and Cosmetic Act. Please note that for some medicines which are sensitive to pharmacy rules, we will ask a genuine prescription to be verified before sale.

By registering Your phone number and email with us, You consent to be contacted by Us via phone calls and/or SMS notifications or emails, in case of any order or shipment or delivery related updates and/or to update you about new offers and promotions..
Changes to these Terms and Conditions

we reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions from time to time without further notice to you.Any such amendments we make shall be effective once we post a revised version of these Terms and Conditions
Password must contain(At least one upper case,one digit,one special character,eight in length)
World of medicines c/o Prasad medical and general stores opposite bank of India, cement road, pratapnagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra, India 440022
